title: Fantasy RPG Music Collection - Exploration
description: High quality exploration music collection ready to use in any fantasy video game.
longDescription:
Fantasy RPG Music Collection â€“ Combat

This music pack contains 74 professionally composed, produced and mixed audio files made from 10 tracks. A compilation of background music tracks inspired by the music of the greatest RPG games makes perfect addition for your next fantasy video game.


SOUNDCLOUD DEMO


---------------

READY TO GO

---------------

Full tracks, loops, intros and endings included. Some of the tracks have additional variants.

(full tracklist below).


--------------

SAFE TO USE

--------------

All of my music is royalty free and streaming friendly. You can be sure that streamers will not get copyright claim from YouTube, Twitch, etc. while streaming your game with my music.


Check my other Fantasy music packs:

Fantasy RPG Music Collection - Combat

Fantasy RPG Music Collection - Dungeons

Fantasy RPG Music Collection - Themes

Big Fantasy RPG Music Bundle

Epic Journey - Fantasy RPG Music Collection

Epic Journey 2 - Fantasy RPG Music Collection

Kingdom Arise - Fantasy RPG Music Collection
